Package org.zaproxy.zap.authentication

Class HttpAuthenticationMethodType.HttpAuthenticationMethod

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationMethod
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.HttpAuthenticationMethodType.HttpAuthenticationMethod
Enclosing class:
HttpAuthenticationMethodType
public static class HttpAuthenticationMethodType.HttpAuthenticationMethod extends AuthenticationMethod
The implementation for an AuthenticationMethodType where the Users are authenticated through HTTP Authentication.

    • authenticate

      public WebSession authenticate(SessionManagementMethod sessionManagementMethod, AuthenticationCredentials credentials, User user) throws AuthenticationMethod.UnsupportedAuthenticationCredentialsException
      Description copied from class: AuthenticationMethod
      Performs an authentication in a web application, returning an authenticated.
      Specified by:
      authenticate in class AuthenticationMethod
      Parameters:
      sessionManagementMethod - the set up session management method is provided so it can be used, if needed, to automatically extract session information from Http Messages.
      credentials - the credentials
      user - the user to authenticate
      Returns:
      an authenticated web session
      Throws:
      AuthenticationMethod.UnsupportedAuthenticationCredentialsException - the unsupported authentication credentials exception WebSession.
